quote: A dysfunctional family is any family with more than one person in it.
author: Mary Karr,  The Liars' Club

quote: Family {Couplet} For my misery, family brings relief,tripling my joy, halving my grief.This aesthetic arithmetic's quite poetic,an accounting surmounting odds unsympathetic.Now there seems no hardship I cannot withstand,accompanied by my exponential, familial band.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I have a great family, I live an amazing life.
author: John Oates

quote: I sustain myself with the love of family.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
author: Richard Bach

quote: My fam is just a regular family. But all of them have great senses of humor.
author: Dane Cook

quote: The family is the cradle of the world's misinformation.
author: Don DeLillo,  White Noise

quote: Families are designed to nurture the minds, wills, and emotions of its members so that the barriers created by fear of the unknown can be replaced by the confidence that comes from knowing you are loved whether you succeed or fail.
author: Leigh A. Bortins,  The Core: Teaching Your Child the Foundations of Classical Education

quote: A family can be the bane of one's existence. A family can also be most of the meaning of one's existence. I don't know whether my family is bane or meaning, but they have surely gone away and left a large hole in my heart.
author: Keri Hulme,  The Bone People

quote: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.
author: Ralph Fiennes

quote: My family has been amazing, and they understand how blessed I am. They've been able to keep my sense of humor.
author: Karen Duffy

quote: When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching -- they are your family.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
author: John Wooden

quote: The happiness of a family is such a complex matter. Like a table laid out with a tea service, it looks so ordinary until it's threatened. Then it becomes infinitely precious.
author: Lynda Williams,  Holy war

quote: Siblings: children of the same parents, each of whom is perfectly normal until they get together.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Family [10w] Family is a truth pill ~ just beware of an overdose.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: A family is a risky venture, because the greater the love, the greater the loss... That's the trade-off. But I'll take it all.
author: Brad Pitt

quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: My mother used to tell me that when push comes to shove, you always know who to turn to. That being a family isn't a social construct but an instinct.
author: Jodi Picoult,  Keeping Faith

quote: I went to boarding school in the country, so there's no real differentiation between family and friends. I went there from when I was 8 until I was 17 - it was insane. If you earn my friendship, you are my family, and I'll do anything for you.
author: Jamie Campbell Bower

quote: Obviously, if I was serious about having a relationship with someone long-term, the last people I would introduce him to would be my family.
author: Chelsea Handler,  Are You There, Vodka? It's Me, Chelsea

quote: We are a noisy and blessed little family
author: Nancy E. Turner,  These Is My Words: The Diary of Sarah Agnes Prine, 1881-1901

quote: This is part of what a family is about, not just love. It's knowing that your family will be there watching out for you. Nothing else will give you that. Not money. Not fame. Not work.
author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie

quote: The heart of a person only beats when it's surrounded by blood, by family.
author: Erica Goros,  The Daisy Chain

quote: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina

quote: My father... very generous, very philanthropic, very charitable man. My siblings and I and my mother continue with always appreciating and always giving back. It's something I hope that I've become a role model for my children.
author: Steve Tisch

quote: Writers will happen in the best of families.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Every mother has to take care of her family.
author: Kelly Long,  Sarah's Garden

quote: I'm a 21st-century kid trapped in a 19th-century family.
author: Bill Watterson,  There's Treasure Everywhere

quote: I've been so fortunate in my life that my family has never been jealous of my success. They have shown true love and commitment to me by being supportive. They shared in it.
author: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: Fuck it... That's really the attitude that keeps a family together, it's not "we love each other", it's just "fuck it, man.
author: Louis C.K.

quote: One thing my family has shown me is that having a sense of humor is everything.
author: Zoey Deutch

quote: I have five boys in the family, and it's constant competition, sport, humor, and practical jokes.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: I thought my family was really funny. Everybody in my family was funny. My mom and dad both have great senses of humor and really saw the funny in stuff, so I think that's probably where it came from. I always try to see the funny in things.
author: Christine Ebersole

quote: Each time you say hello to a stranger, your heart acknowledges over and over again that we are all family.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Family, friends and relationships are the blessings of the God. They are the best way to access God.
author: Amit Ray,  Nonviolence: The Transforming Power

quote: The great danger for family life, in the midst of any society whose idols are pleasure, comfort and independence, lies in the fact that people close their hearts and become selfish.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
author: George Burns

quote: I do have a point to all this,” she continues. “There are like twenty people in that waiting room right now. Some of them are related to you. Some of them are not. But we’re all your family.” She stops now. Leans over me so that the wisps of her hair tickle my face. She kisses me on the forehead. “You still have a family,” she whispers.
author: Gayle Forman,  If I Stay

quote: Families are messy. Immortal families are eternally messy. Sometimes the best we can do is to remind each other that we're related for better or for worse...and try to keep the maiming and killing to a minimum.
author: Rick Riordan,  The Sea of Monsters

quote: Friends are the family you choose (~ Nin/Ithilnin, Elven rogue).
author: Jess C. Scott,  The Other Side of Life

quote: What's really cool about our family is that we don't hold grudges, and I think that is what's been the key to the success. We get into our little disagreements, and whether we're right or wrong, we'll go and apologize. That's just the way we are.
author: Selena

quote: I love 'Braxton Family Values!' I love seeing a strong family unit striving for success while dealing with everyday struggles like everyone else. Whatever drama they find themselves in, they find a way to solve it and get back to the importance of family. A positive show for sure.
author: Drew Sidora

quote: There can be hope only for a society which acts as one big family, not as many separate ones.
author: Anwar Sadat

quote: I saw a bottle of conditioner the other day that said, "Family Size,"and I thought, That's odd, I didn't know too many families showered together.
author: Jarod Kintz,  There are Two Typos of People in This World: Those Who Can Edit and Those Who Can't

quote: When I was growing up we didn't have a massive house and there were five women running around, so my dad and I had to stick together!
author: Louis Tomlinson,  Dare to Dream: Life as One Direction

quote: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty. All other pacts of love or fear derive from it and are modeled upon it.
author: Haniel Long

quote: A home with a loving and loyal husband and wife is the supreme setting in which children can be reared in love and righteousness and in which the spiritual and physical needs of children can be met.
author: David A. Bednar

quote: I want to go to Martha’s Vineyard. I have an aunt named Martha. And an uncle by that name. Neither one is related to me.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks

quote: The story of my family. . .changes with the teller.
author: Jennifer Haigh,  Faith
